title: How Contact with World Travel Team?
description: Hey, We are ready to help. We love travel. You wnat to travel with us. We help you to travel in the wold.

title: If you could swim with dolphins or go shark diving, which would you pick?
description: Dolphins also have the advantage of speed as they can swim faster than most shark species. Of course, the biggest advantage dolphins have over sharks is intelligence, especially through echolocation (when dolphins send sound waves through the ocean).

title: What place is top of your bucket list?
description: Paris, France - The City of Lights.Machu Picchu, Peru.The Grand Canyon.New Zealand - The Land Where Adventures Wait. Colosseum, Rome. Bora Bora, French-Polynesia - A colossal cosmos encircled by a mystique lagoon.London, England - London: The heritage of England.

title: Travelling solo will give you a sense of independence. This is really nice and almost makes you feel more alive and capable. Going on a solo trip would be especially helpful to someone who has lived at home all their life, or someone who hasn't properly had to look after themselves before.
If you could only ever eat rice or potatoes, which would you pick?
description: Potatoes are the healthier option in terms of macronutrients since they are lower in calories and fat and higher in fiber, while containing about the same amount of protein as white rice.
